title: Windows XP Pro SP3 Extended Edition 2008
description:
Microsoft Windows XP pro Extended Edition 2008
--------------------------------------------------------

This CD has

- Windows XP Pro with SP3, unmodified MSDN VLK version

- integrated CD boot menu (see menu.jpg)
             Boot from hdd
             Windows setup
             Hiren&#039;s Boot CD 9.5

- Unatteneded setup
             the setup will use
                          username : user
                          company   : home

- With windows, automatically installs the follwing
             Adobe Reader 8.12
             Some cool flash games ( can be accessed through Start ->All Programs->Games->Flash Games
             flash player & shockwave player
             Irfan View 4.1 with all plugins
             K-Lite mega codec pack 3.90
             Opea 9.27
             Pocket Oxford Dictionary
             Sysinternals Suite ( can be accessed through Start ->All Programs->Accessories->Utilities )
             TuneUp Utilities 2008
             Tweak UI XP (at Control Panel)
             Winamp Pro 5.53
             WinRar 3.71
             Windows Media Player 11

- Lots of registry tweaks

- In additin to the above applications, the following apps are also included (not unattended setup)
             Bitlord 1.1
             Daemon Tools Lite 4.1.23
             Firefox Setup 2.0.0.14
             Internet Download Manager 5.12
             Kaspersky Antivirus 6.0.2.614

N.B. Due to bandwidth limitation of my internet connection, i can seed only from 20:30 to 2:30(GMT).
